PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-01292019-02-28,  ,  ,  ,  ESDC,  CEIC
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) align the Employment Insurance Regulations with amendments to the Employment Insurance Act; and (2) ensure that all eligible claimants can access the additional weeks provided under the Employment Insurance Parental Sharing Benefit.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0058 Publication Date: 2019-03-20
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) align the Employment Insurance Regulations with amendments to the Employment Insurance Act; and (2) ensure that all eligible claimants can access the additional weeks provided under the Employment Insurance Parental Sharing Benefit.
